fields.description: Optional field to control adding assignments to students' and teachers' calendars when the assignment is published. The possible values are: none, studentsAndPublisher, studentsAndTeamOwners, unknownFutureValue, and studentsOnly. Use the Prefer: include-unknown-enum-members request header to get the following value in this evolvable enum: studentsOnly. The default value is none.
fields.name: AddToCalendarAction

fields.description: Class-level default behavior for handling students who are added after the assignment is published. Possible values are: none, assignIfOpen.
fields.name: AddedStudentAction

fields.description: Class-level default value for due time field. Default value is 23:59:00.
fields.name: DueTime

fields.description: Default Teams channel to which notifications are sent. Default value is null.
fields.name: NotificationChannelUrl
